definition: (arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth

sentences.english: A dung beetle lives in a small burrow beneath the hill which was dug by himself. He was so lonely.
sentences.chinese: 一隻屎殼郎孤獨地住在山腳下它自己挖的小洞中。

sentences.english: The extraordinary strength of many of the beetles is due to their unusual mating arrangements。
sentences.chinese: 很多這種屎殼郎的驚人力量源於它們特殊的交配形式。

definition: Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
armpit/also pr. [ge1 zhi5 wo1]/also written 夾肢窩|夹肢窝[ga1 zhi5 wo1]
child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1
